about_the_game:
This Celestial Pack includes 10 astral Clothing Items, 4 astral Wigs, 10 astral Furniture Items, 1 astral Mount, and 1 astral Pet.

Space lovers unite! This Celestial Pack is full of 26 star-themed items that will transform your farm into an outer space wonderland.

Pack includes:
  • Astral Furniture Set: Astral Chair, Gilded Astral Table, Astral Couch, Astral Wardrobe, Astral Cauldron End Table, Astral Ram Bed, Astral Night Light, Gilded Astral Rug, Large Moon Globe and Gilded Moon Globe
  • Astral Outfit Set: Astral Dress, Astral Matador Shirt, and Astral Matador Pants
  • Moon Outfit Set: Moon Forehead Marking and Moon Crest Hair Clip
  • Cloud Outfit Set: Cloud Wig and Cloud Halo
  • Space Outfit Set: Space Wig, Galaxy Halo, and Galaxy Witch Hat
  • Star Outfit Set: Starry Night Wig, Astral Braid Wig, Star Sunglasses, and Star Earrings
  • Astral Ram Mount
  • Apollo, the Celestial Cow Pet

name: Sun Haven: Celestial Pack
